Disease.content:
Please identify the "Disease" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The aim of this study was to evaluate changes in the regulation of lipid metabolism , ERK and LDLr expression in the liver of rats exposed to subacute diazinon .

Let's think step by step.

| Disease |
| --- |
| subacute diazinon |

Note: "subacute diazinon" is a chemical that can cause disease or harm to organisms, including rats, and is mentioned in the context of an experiment. Therefore, it is appropriate to include it as a "Disease" entity in this case.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Disease" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Disease".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Disease |
| --- |
| subacute diazinon |

Note: In the given paragraph, the only term that can be considered as a disease or a medical condition is "subacute diazinon". The other terms such as "lipid metabolism", "ERK", and "LDLr expression" are biological processes or expressions, not diseases. Therefore, the table above contains the only valid "Disease" entity in the paragraph.

Chemical.content:
Please identify the "Chemical" entities in the following paragraph. Please present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical". Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

Paragraph: The aim of this study was to evaluate changes in the regulation of lipid metabolism , ERK and LDLr expression in the liver of rats exposed to subacute diazinon .

Let's think step by step.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| diazinon |
| lipid metabolism |
| ERK |
| LDLr |

Note: I included "lipid metabolism" as a chemical entity because it is a biological process involving lipids, which are a type of organic compound. ERK (Extracellular signal-regulated kinases) and LDLr (Low-density lipoprotein receptor) are also chemical entities as they are proteins involved in cell signaling and lipid metabolism, respectively.

Please remove entities that do not clearly refer to "Chemical" and present the valid entities as a Markdown table with one column "Chemical".

Make sure to present the entities precisely in the same words as in the original paragraph.

| Chemical |
| --- |
| diazinon |

Note: I have removed "lipid metabolism," "ERK," and "LDLr" from the list as they do not clearly refer to chemical entities. "Lipid metabolism" is a biological process, while "ERK" and "LDLr" are proteins, which are not considered chemical entities in the context of the given paragraph. "Diazinon" is the only clear chemical entity mentioned in the paragraph.
